start-dialogue-0: There's a spiral staircase inside the bridge, you gotta check it out!
start-dialogue-1: Great Harbor Bridge has a turning show at 3 PM every day!
start-dialogue-2: Close your eyes, take a deep breath, and enjoy nature's beauty!
start-dialogue-3: Hi there! I'm Kaohsiung Bear, welcome to Kaohsiung!
start-dialogue-4: If you're lucky, you'll see big ships entering and leaving the harbor, super cool!
start-dialogue-5: Romantic ocean views from Great Harbor Bridge, perfect for dates and photos!
